This restaurant is well-tailored to please Americans with super-sized appetites who like large portions and are not picky about quality.  Think the Olive Garden.  We were not impressed with anything we had--the bread with olives and onions (focaccia strips) was stale.  The menu offers many many pasta selections that can be paired with many sauce selections.  The three we ordered were a bit like pouring a mediocre bottled sauce on pasta.
